overview: IntensaFireStore.com is dedicated to providing every gamer with the best modded Xbox 360 controller on the market today. Every retail version, brand new Sony and Microsoft rapid fire Xbox 360 controller is American-made, and preprogrammed with several modes to make destroying competitors effortless. The modded Xbox 360 controllers have guaranteed compatibility with the market’s most popular first-person shooters like “Battlefield 3,” “Modern Warfare3” and several more. IntensaFireStore.com stands by their products, which is why gamers can buy a modded Xbox 360 controller with confidence. Every controller comes with a free six-month warranty, which provides gamers with 150 more days than other controller providers.
